title: Introducing Contentlayer (Beta): Content Made Easy for Developers

cover_image.alt: Contentlayer Makes Working with Content Easy for Developers

excerpt: Working with content data (e.g. Markdown files or CMS) is a surprisingly difficult and laborious task when developing modern sites (e.g. with Next.js). Contentlayer is a content SDK that aims to make content easy for developers.

body.raw:
Working with content data (e.g. Markdown files or CMS) is a surprisingly difficult and laborious task when developing modern sites (e.g. with Next.js). Contentlayer is a that aims to make content easy for developers with a focus on great DX and performance. We're very excited to officially release Contentlayer in beta after many months of alpha testing and already being used in over 300 projects.
